name: Run for the Hills (Early Access)
description:
Run for the Hills is an independently developed procedurally generated infinite horror runner staring Oli. She works for the great old ones and has been tasked with restoring 4 idols to open the gate once the stars align.
The game feature interactive environments and enemies that randomly and procedurally generate so you never play the same game twice!!
Be warned it is almost impossible to complete all four idols.
www.ejg3d.com
